full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA YAB YUM GYI BSGOM BZLAS NYAMS SU LEN TSUL GNANG DON SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
